title: add option for sorted or random selection of genomes
body: Make an option to choose if one wants to download random genomes or have it sorted by some quality criteria

title: Add option for dplyr type of metadata filtering
body: Swtich to customable dplyr filter syntax instead of individual filter arguments like `--mimag`, `--representative`, etc.

title: Unified output directory
body: Make output everything into a single directory, including log file and make `--out_tax` and `--contig2genome` into flag arguments?
